name: get_cost_report
description: Generate a detailed cost report for a specified time period. Shows total spending, breakdown by agent and conversation type, top expenses, and cost trends. Perfect for understanding where AI costs are going.

user_id.description: User ID to generate report for (optional - defaults to current user)

date_from.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (default: 30 days ago)

date_to.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (default: today)

group_by.description: How to group the cost data (optional)

include_breakdown.description: Include detailed breakdown by agent and type (default: true)

include_trends.description: Include trend analysis vs previous period (default: true)
